channel.title: I got a few problems...kind of "noob" at coding
channel.description:
Alright, first of all and most importantly, I want to make it so when i log in, it says "Owner xm1k3x has logged in" and for my Co-owners:"Co-owner (name) has logged in"and same thing for mods..
Second..I'm wondering how to make a ::switch command to switch mages...and I want to make it so only admins and co-owners can use it(and me).
Third...For some reason, my ipban command won't work...and sometimes even ::giveadmin and ::giveowner don't work.
Fourth, if someone could please post how to make a ::givemem command for me and please make sure you tell me where to put it.. -.-

item.title: I got a few problems...kind of "noob" at coding
item.dc:creator: @xm1k3x xm1k3x
item.description:
@xm1k3x wrote:

Alright, first of all and most importantly, I want to make it so when i log in, it says “Owner xm1k3x has logged in” and for my Co-owners:"Co-owner (name) has logged in"and same thing for mods…

Second…I’m wondering how to make a ::switch command to switch mages…and I want to make it so only admins and co-owners can use it(and me).

Third…For some reason, my ipban command won’t work…and sometimes even ::giveadmin and ::giveowner don’t work.

Fourth, if someone could please post how to make a ::givemem command for me and please make sure you tell me where to put it… -.-
